Plintissa pointed to the Maximal base, telling them that the Maximals were
the enemy...
----- Original Message -----
From: "ilovealllizards" <ilovealllizards@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 5:26 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> *Kamodia and Wrath step out of the CR Chambers repaired and hear Plintissa
> and run out of the secret passageway in the swamp and head toward the
> Maximal base to get orders from Plintissa*
>
>
>
>
> *By the Pred base Drazom, Mantella and Stingtra sit on some rocks*
*Stingtra
> converts to Beast mode and notices a rat and she starts chasing it*
*Drazom
> and Mantella convert to Beast mode. Drazom looks into Mantella's eyes and
he
> too feels her sadness. He notices a little flower patch by the rock and
> bends down to pick them but  instead he see's an old dusty pot. He picks
it
> up and dusts it off and scoops up some water from a puddle into the pot
and
> pulls the flowers up and keeps the roots on. He then puts the flowers in
the
> pot along with a little dirt and hands it to Mantella. Drazom: I kept the
> roots on so it can bloom more then once. Mantella stares at it while not
> moving an inch. Drazom stares at the stiff Mantella. Then she eats a bug
> that was on one of the flowers. Her big red eyes roll up at Drazom and a
> smile developes on Mantella's face*
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 5:06 AM
> Subject: Neo Beast Wars
>
>
> > Plintissa was outraged, she was sick of being blamed for stuff she never
> > did! plintissa called the Radicons, Wrath, Kamodia, and the Sin brothers
> on
> > her commlink.
> >
> > "All People's troops, we will soon destroy the Maximals, get ready."
> > Plintissa said. Of course her troops would spare Iron Raptor, however,
but
> > she walked to the base to say goodbye to her old friend Iron Raptor. She
> > passed Ramhorn on the bridge, looking at him she laughed.
> >
> > "Little Ramhorn, Maximal worshipper!" Plintissa said. Plintissa walked
> away
> > from the base, deciding to tell Iron Raptor goodbye over commlink.
> Plintissa
> > and Dracona walked out and sat in the meadow. Plintissa called out to
> Liono
> > on her commlink.
> >
> > "Liono, I don't give a damn about your troops. It's time for some
> maiming."
> > Plintissa said. Dracona pulled out a heavy blaster rifle from her Cyber
> > storage compartment and handed it to Plintissa. Plintissa locked it onto
> her
> > arm and smileed. Dracona locked onto her arm an ion disk launcher.
> >
> > "Let's get ready to rumble!" Plintissa yelled out. Plintissa leapt on
top
> of
> > a rock, Sinesis and Sinister standing behind her with Dracona. Plintissa
> > called Iron Raptor on her commlink.
> >
> > Iron Raptor, this is Plintissa, sorry but goodbye, I can not be your
> friend
> > anymore, all because i'm not wanted here anymore. Farewell old
friend..."
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: <RgDaN@...>
> > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 1:41 AM
> > Subject: Re: My last post till tuesday
> >
> >
> > > Liono walks toward the messenger then stops after hearing Plintisssa
> > comment.
> > >  Liono slow turns and Looks back "I Don't give a Damn what you do
> > Plintisssa.
> > > You made your choices now quit looking to others for approval."  Liono
> > turns
> > > back keeps walking watching Plissanta out the corner of his
eye."Because
> > it
> > > seems to me your care more about how me and the others think and feel
> > about
> > > you than you do about doing the right thing." Liono laughs whole
hearted
> > "If
> > > you came here thinking power will gain you respect you still a child
> > playing
> > > with toys you have yet to understand. Even I can a mass great power
but
> > what
> > > good is it if my spark is in doubt and it starts to become bitter and
> > twisted
> > > like a snake and I have to look to others to find out who I am then
you
> > have
> > > your power I rather just a Lion Roaring in Night" Liono reaches the
> > messenger
> > > "tell Hellbeast and Zardus that I'll meet them at the beach sector
7629
> > tell
> > > to only bring 1 other member of there team or all deals are off."
> > >
